name: Deadbeat (fie)
description:
(you may experience some lag in the browser version, please play on the downloadable if that's the case) 「 Sick Tracks To Perish To ! 」

Here's a hololive fangame I made, inspired by Calliope Mori and the Deadbeats. 

Play through her songs while trying not to die, y'know, again.

It's highly inspired by Everhood. Do play the original, it's an amazing game!

Credits

The game was made by fie @zkfie (a tired Deadbeat himself).

The songs are by Calliope Mori from Hololive English.

Calliope Mori - 失礼しますが、RIP Remix by Solkatt-P

Calliope Mori - 失礼しますが、RIP  House Remix by scarps

  

Music

Calliope Mori - 失礼しますが、RIP♡ (House remix) . https://youtu.be/Hqb3yGMpu-s

Calliope Mori - The Grim Reaper is a Live-Streamer  . https://youtu.be/Z5VxUvL_uBo

Calliope Mori - Cursed Night  . https://youtu.be/VYu3PvRPZR8

Calliope Mori - Off With Their Heads . https://youtu.be/_M-6lkoi6L4

Calliope Mori - 失礼しますが、RIP♡ (Solkatt-P remix) . https://youtu.be/pAefkEtMO2o  

 

Disclaimer

This is a free fangame. I'm not affiliated nor endorsed by Hololive, Cover Corp, or Calliope Mori in any capacity.

Feel free to do whatever type of content you would like to with the game, like videos and posts. 

It makes me super happy, so if you do, please share it with me.
